original: Almström, Gustaf Karl, stadskemist, Göteborg, f. 10/6/86 i Sthlm av disp. Adolf Fredrik Robert A. o. Eva Ida Maria Anderberg. — Fil. kand. i Upps. 09, fil. lic. 12, fil. dr 15. Stud:res. t. Tyskl 09, Frankr. 10. Bitr. lär. v. Upps. univ. 13-17, doc. 14-20, assist, v. stadskemistens lab. i Gbg 18, stadskemist där sed. 26. Skr.: avh. o. upps. i kemi o. mineralogi. Älpadie, Sigge Peter, kyrkoherde, Mar serum, f. 11/3/05 i Gbg av köpm. Oscar A. o. Therese Hansson. G. 31 m. Hedvig Maria Sköldin. Barn: Birgitta f. 32, Tord 35. — Studiex. i Sthlm 24, teol. fil. ex. 27, teol. kand., prakt, teol prov o. prästv. f. Lunds ’Stift 28. V. pastor i Ivetofta 28-30, kommin. i Mjällby 30-37, kyrkoh. i Aryd sed. 38. Ordf. i Mjällby barnavind, v. ordf. i Mjällby folksk :styr., fattigv istyr. o. kyrkofullm., seikr. i Mjällby arbetslösh ikomm., led. av ;komm :fullm. i Mjällby, ordf. i Äryds kyrkofullm., kyrkostämma, folksk :-styr., fattigv :styr. o. barnav :nd, v. ordf. i pens:ndn, led. av komm:fullm. o. hälsovind, huvudm. o. rev. i Äryds sparb., kyrkokassör.
translated:
Almström, Gustaf Karl, city chemist in Gothenburg. Born June 10th, 1886 in Stockholm to dispenser Adolf Fredrik Robert A. and Eva Ida Maria Anderberg. Completed Bachelor of Philosophy degree in Uppsala in 1909, Master of Philosophy in 1912, and Doctorate in Philosophy in 1915. Studied abroad in Germany in 1909 and France in 1910. Served as assistant lecturer at Uppsala University from 1913-1917, lecturer from 1914-1920, assistant at the city chemist's laboratory in Gothenburg in 1918, and city chemist there since 1926. Authored papers and studies in chemistry and mineralogy.

Älpadie, Sigge Peter, parish pastor in Marserum. Born March 11th, 1905 in Gothenburg to merchant Oscar A. and Therese Hansson. Married to Hedvig Maria Sköldin in 1931, and has two children: Birgitta born in 1932, and Tord born in 1935. Completed high school in Stockholm in 1924, theology degree in 1927, theological candidacy, practical theological test, and priest ordination for Lund's diocese in 1928. Worked as assistant pastor in Ivetofta from 1928-1930, vicar in Mjällby from 1930-1937, and parish pastor in Aryd since 1938. Served as chairman of the Mjällby children's wind farm, vice chairman of the Mjällby elementary school board, poor relief board, and church council. Sekr. of the Mjällby unemployment committee, member of the municipality council in Mjällby, chairman of the Äryd church council, church meeting, elementary school board, poor relief board, and children's wind farm. Vice chairman of the pension committee, member of the municipality council and health fund, manager and auditor for Äryd savings bank, and church treasurer.
